com.simsilica.es.net

Class TransientUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.simsilica.es.net.TransientUtils

  • public class TransientUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Some utils for cleaning transient component references or arrays of references.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TransientUtils()

      static <T extends com.simsilica.es.EntityComponent> 
      T      		 clean(T component) 
      static <T extends com.simsilica.es.EntityComponent> 
      T[]      		 clean(T[] array)
      If there are no transient components in the specified array they are nulled out if supportTransients is true.
      static boolean getSupportTransientComponents() 
      static <T extends com.simsilica.es.EntityComponent> 
      T[]      		 safeClean(T[] array)
      If there are no transient components in the specified array then it is returned directly, else a clone is returned with null elements where any transient components previously existed.
      static void setSupportTransientComponents(boolean f)
      Turns suport for transient components on/off.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TransientUtils

        public TransientUtils()

    • Method Detail

      • setSupportTransientComponents

        public static void setSupportTransientComponents(boolean f)
        Turns suport for transient components on/off. There is a small performance penalty to check arrays for transient components. Setting this option to false will cause the checks to be skipped. Defaults to true so checks will be performed by default.

      • getSupportTransientComponents

        public static boolean getSupportTransientComponents()

      • safeClean

        public static <T extends com.simsilica.es.EntityComponent> T[] safeClean(T[] array)
        If there are no transient components in the specified array then it is returned directly, else a clone is returned with null elements where any transient components previously existed.

      • clean

        public static <T extends com.simsilica.es.EntityComponent> T[] clean(T[] array)
        If there are no transient components in the specified array they are nulled out if supportTransients is true.

      • clean

        public static <T extends com.simsilica.es.EntityComponent> T clean(T component)
